package com.easylinkin.bm.extractor;

import com.alibaba.fastjson.JSONObject;import com.drew.imaging.ImageMetadataReader;import com.drew.imaging.ImageProcessingException;import com.drew.metadata.Directory;import com.drew.metadata.Metadata;import com.drew.metadata.Tag;import com.easylinkin.bm.util.HttpUtils;import lombok.extern.slf4j.Slf4j;

import java.io.File;import java.io.IOException;

@Slf4jpublic class ImgTestCode {    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {

        File file = new File("C:\\Users\\zhengwen\\Desktop\\test\\IMG_20210820_093958.jpg");        readImageInfo(file);    }

        private static void readImageInfo(File file) throws ImageProcessingException, Exception {        Metadata metadata = ImageMetadataReader.readMetadata(file);

        System.out.println("---æ‰“å°å…¨éƒ¨è¯¦æƒ…---");        for (Directory directory : metadata.getDirectories()) {            for (Tag tag : directory.getTags()) {                System.out.format("[%s] - %s = %s\n",                        directory.getName(), tag.getTagName(), tag.getDescription());            }            if (directory.hasErrors()) {                for (String error : directory.getErrors()) {                    System.err.format("ERROR: %s", error);                }            }        }

        System.out.println("--æ‰“å°å¸¸ç”¨ä¿¡æ¯---");                Double lat = null;        Double lng = null;        for (Directory directory : metadata.getDirectories()) {            for (Tag tag : directory.getTags()) {                String tagName = tag.getTagName();                  String desc = tag.getDescription();                 if (tagName.equals("Image Height")) {                    System.err.println("å›¾ç‰‡é«˜åº¦: " + desc);                } else if (tagName.equals("Image Width")) {                    System.err.println("å›¾ç‰‡å®½åº¦: " + desc);                } else if (tagName.equals("Date/Time Original")) {                    System.err.println("æ‹æ‘„æ—¶é—´: " + desc);                } else if (tagName.equals("GPS Latitude")) {                    System.err.println("çº¬åº¦ : " + desc);                    System.err.println("çº¬åº¦(åº¦åˆ†ç§’æ ¼å¼) : " + pointToLatlong(desc));                    lat = latLng2Decimal(desc);                } else if (tagName.equals("GPS Longitude")) {                    System.err.println("ç»åº¦: " + desc);                    System.err.println("ç»åº¦(åº¦åˆ†ç§’æ ¼å¼): " + pointToLatlong(desc));                    lng = latLng2Decimal(desc);                }            }        }        System.err.println("--ç»çº¬åº¦è½¬åœ°å€--");                convertGpsToLoaction(lat, lng);



    }

        public static String pointToLatlong(String point) {        Double du = Double.parseDouble(point.substring(0, point.indexOf("Â°")).trim());        Double fen = Double.parseDouble(point.substring(point.indexOf("Â°") + 1, point.indexOf("'")).trim());        Double miao = Double.parseDouble(point.substring(point.indexOf("'") + 1, point.indexOf("\"")).trim());        Double duStr = du + fen / 60 + miao / 60 / 60;        return duStr.toString();    }

        public static double latLng2Decimal(String gps) {        String a = gps.split("Â°")[0].replace(" ", "");        String b = gps.split("Â°")[1].split("'")[0].replace(" ", "");        String c = gps.split("Â°")[1].split("'")[1].replace(" ", "").replace("\"", "");        double gps_dou = Double.parseDouble(a) + Double.parseDouble(b) / 60 + Double.parseDouble(c) / 60 / 60;        return gps_dou;    }

        private static void convertGpsToLoaction(double gps_latitude, double gps_longitude) throws IOException {        String apiKey = "YNxcSCAphFvuPD4LwcgWXwC3SEZZc7Ra";

        String res = "";        String url = "http://api.map.baidu.com/reverse_geocoding/v3/?ak=" + apiKey + "&output=json&coordtype=wgs84ll&location=" + (gps_latitude + "," + gps_longitude);        System.err.println("ã€urlã€‘" + url);

        res = HttpUtils.httpGet(url);        JSONObject object = JSONObject.parseObject(res);        if (object.containsKey("result")) {            JSONObject result = object.getJSONObject("result");            if (result.containsKey("addressComponent")) {                JSONObject address = object.getJSONObject("result").getJSONObject("addressComponent");                System.err.println("æ‹æ‘„åœ°ç‚¹ï¼š" + address.get("country") + " " + address.get("province") + " " + address.get("city") + " " + address.get("district") + " "                        + address.get("street") + " " + result.get("formatted_address") + " " + result.get("business"));            }        }    }

future<uint64_t>Â ReadAsync(vector<File>Â Inputs)Â {

Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â [read_size]Â (autoÂ &&Input){Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â releasedÂ afterÂ ReadAsyncÂ ends.
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â returnÂ ReadImplAsync(Input).then([read_size](autoÂ &&size){
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â *read_sizeÂ +=Â size;
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â returnÂ make_ready_future();
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â });
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â })
Â Â Â Â Â Â .then([read_size]Â {Â returnÂ make_ready_future<uint64_t>(*read_size);Â });
}Â
